description: Cook up a batch of this super yummy meatball recipe and stir through cooked spaghetti, serve in a sub or on rice. The kids will be asking for more.
keywords: Meatballs,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Jul 2022,Beef,Zucchini,Mince,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Easy Meatballs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Spray a medium baking dish with oil.

Combine mince, zucchini, garlic, breadcrumbs and dried herbs in a medium bowl. Season with pepper. Using hands, roll heaped tablespoonfuls of mixture into 16 balls. Place in dish and bake for 18 minutes or until browned.
Add passata and half of the basil to dish and stir to combine. Bake for 10 minutes or until passata has thickened and meatballs are cooked through. Scatter over remaining basil, then serve.
